data.title: Brooklyn Musicians Produce Remix on Lenovo Yoga
data.description: Brooklyn-based musicians Spirit Guide and COSYCOS took Lenovo's IdeaPad Yoga for a test drive, working collaboratively to remix a COSYCOS track on the Yoga PC. Follow the link to download the remix from SoundCloud http://lnv.gy/T8FSo9

data.title: Lenovo Yoga Multimode Ultrabook
data.description: You'll flip for Yoga, our new multimode PC that packs a surprising amount of productivity and entertainment into one thin, light design. (Music: "I Love It" by Icona Pop) Learn More: http://lnv.gy/Yoga

data.title: Lenovo IdeaPad Yoga tour

data.title: Gadget Show Live 2012 - Lenovo IdeaPad Yoga
data.description: A look at our exciting Lenovo IdeaPad Yoga at The Gadget Show Live 2012. The show is the UK's leading consumer technology event and the destination for those obsessed with gadgets! Learn More: http://www.lenovo.com/

data.title: Muuyu and ThinkPad Edge Take Yoga Digital
data.description: Matt Devine--yoga teacher and founder of Muuyu, one of the world's first online interactive eYoga platforms--describes how Muuyu and a ThinkPad Edge PC with the latest Intel Core processors are enabling yoga teachers and students to virtually practice yoga from any location.
